channel.title: Loading flashicons on npc
channel.description:
Hello,
i made a new barrows, I made when you click it( the sarcopgahus ) that it will spawn, buthow i make it make loading flashicons above them?
Please help me,
Thanks I D D S I

item.title: Loading flashicons on npc
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:2, topic:304451”][quote author=I D D S I link=topic=400723.msg2971083#msg2971083 date=1253967614]
Hello,

i made a new barrows,
I made when you click it( the sarcopgahus ) that it will spawn, buthow i make it make loading flashicons above them?

Please help me,

Thanks I D D S I
[/quote]

You mean like, the flashing yellow arrow?[/quote]

Yep exactly what i mean:D

Read full topic
